document.full_text: a medical pathologist, dr. kevorkian challenged social taboos about disease and dying and helped dozens of terminally ill patients end their lives.
document.title: jack kevorkian, 1928-2011: dr. jack kevorkian dies at 83; a doctor who helped end lives
lines_and_colors: a medical pathologist, dr. kevorkian challenged social taboos about disease and dying and helped dozens of terminally ill patients end their lives.
